name: Fantasy town joyride
description:
Computer graphics student project by:

  • Lejla Hećo
  • Ahmed Prohić

Fantasy town joyride is an endless runner game where you continuously “fly” through the town until an obstacle stops you with the point being to achieve the highest possible score. 

Its quick play, addicting nature, and simple controls make it an accessible genre that virtually anyone can pick up and play. In this game, your spacecraft flies through the Fantasy town forever, avoids obstacles, collects coins and protection power ups, as well as extra lives, and you have the ability to buy and activate new vehicles. It’s family friendly, easy and completely free to play.
